attributes.action: Allow Geert Wilders into the UK Freedom OF Speech and allow the Film Fitna to be watched.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By this government or any future government not to allow a member of the E.U. who is a member of any E.U. parliament like Geert Wilders is against the wests belief in FREEDOM OF SPEECH and also this Upstanding Dutch Gentleman who stands tall in what he believes in,we must stand up against Muslims who violate our European Freedoms and Traditions,and Gordon Brown the Dummy has set us back 60 years to the end of World War 2 in all our FREEDOMS and beliefs.so PLEASE, PLEASE sign this petition.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
